LanguageData.Bullet_Energeticharpoon.label: metal arrow
LanguageData.Bullet_TrashBomb.label: shrapnel bomb
LanguageData.Gun_Energeticharpoon.label: Energetic harpoon
LanguageData.Gun_Energeticharpoon.description: Improved harpoon, still shooting metal arrows, but further accelerated energy camera, which turns a simple harpoon in the awl death
LanguageData.Gun_Energeticharpoon.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.label: Shrapnel Gun
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.description: A massive weapon that uses magnetic acceleration to launch a ball of small, sharp magnets connected to a larger central magnet. Upon impact the central magnet reverses polarity, rapidly launching the smaller connected magnets in a uniform sphere of shrapnel.
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: ShrapnelGun
